metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10060 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cacti before 1.1.37 has XSS because it does not properly reject unintended characters, related to use of the sanitize_uri function in lib/functions.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10060` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
